name: ORS National Report of Case Note Source Analysis
description: PND0016 v00.00.01 Last Modified: 10/09/12                  This report shows the number of case notes entered by users vs automatic system entries by all establishment for a date range entered at runtime. The percentage of case note origination is also shown.

dataset.name: Case Note Count
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.NOTE_SOURCE_CODE, COUNT(AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.NOTE_SOURCE_CODE) AS COUNT_OF_CASE_NOTE_SOURCE_CODE FROM OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_BOOKINGS AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, OMS_OWNER.CASELOAD_AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS, OMS_OWNER.OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES WHERE (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.AGY_LOC_ID) AND (AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID (+)) AND (NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID IN ('OUT', 'TRN') AND NOT AT_CASELOAD_LOCATIONS.CASELOAD_ID IN ('ADMINC', 'CADM_I', 'MULTI')) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID = AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE >= (SELECT START_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('Start Date','D','Case Notes\Contact Date',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:0) */) AND AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.CONTACT_DATE <= (SELECT END_DATE FROM prompt_ /* = #prompt('End Date','D','Case Notes\Contact Date',Mono,Free,Not_Persistent,,User:1) */)) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID, AT_OFFENDER_CASE_NOTES.NOTE_SOURCE_CODE), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID, NOTE_SOURCE_CODE, COUNT_OF_CASE_NOTE_SOURCE_CODE FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: COUNT_OF_CASE_NOTE_SOURCE_CODE
field.display: Count of Case Note Source Code

dataset.name: All Establishments
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.DESCRIPTION, AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID FROM OMS_OWNER.AGENCY_LOCATIONS AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS, USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS WHERE (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGENCY_LOCATION_TYPE = 'INST') AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (AT_OFFENDERS_LOCATIONS.AGY_LOC_ID = USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.CASELOAD_ID) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */))) AND (USER_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOADS.USERNAME = UPPER((SELECT username FROM context_ /* = #Variable('BOUSER') */)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT DESCRIPTION, AGY_LOC_ID FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Case Note Source
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT DT_ALL_CASE_SOURCE.CASENOTESOURCE FROM (SELECT 'AUTO' AS CaseNoteSource FROM DUAL UNION SELECT 'INST' AS CaseNoteSource FROM DUAL) DT_ALL_CASE_SOURCE), dataset_ AS (SELECT CASENOTESOURCE FROM dataset_base_)

filter.name: prefilter_
filter.query: prefilter_ AS (SELECT * FROM dataset_ WHERE ESTABLISHMENT_CODE <> 'ZZGHI')

field.name: $ref:COUNT_OF_CASE_NOTE_SOURCE_CODE
field.display: Count of Case Note Source Code

errors.error: instance.report[0].specification.template is not one of enum values: list,list-section,list-tab,summary,summary-section,parent-child
